text: Philip Mok Kwok-tai () is a professor of electrical engineering at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. He was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 "for contributions to the design of analog power-management integrated circuits". == References == == External links == * Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Philip Mok
